document.full_text: steve stricker clinched his 10th pga tour title by one shot at the memorial tournament on sunday after holding off a birdie barrage from his closest pursuers with an ice-cool display.
document.title: stricker holds nerve to win memorial by one shot
lines_and_colors: steve stricker clinched his 10th pga tour title by one shot at the memorial tournament on sunday after holding off a birdie barrage from his closest pursuers with an ice-cool display.
